column1: '''Alexander Cameron''' (born in [[1935]]) was a member of the [[Notion Club]].
Cameron was a modern historian, especially interested in [[wikipedia:Spanish history
column3: South American]] history. His interests included collecting coins and stamps and playing a pianola.<ref name="List">{{SD

column1: Other members don't seem to remember his being invited to join the Club.<ref name="List"/>
